data.title: Donald Trump elected US president in stunning comeback
data.description: Donald Trump was elected president, capping a remarkable comeback four years after he was voted out of the White House and ushering in a new American leadership likely to test democratic institutions at home and relations abroad.

data.title: Chadchart lauds US system for letting elected leaders complete their term
data.description: This is something Thailand can learn from, says Bangkok governor

data.title: Maris issues clarification on maritime boundary talks with Cambodia
data.description: Any agreement must be approved by parliaments of both countries, he says

data.title: Shopee, Lazada agree to remove illegal food products in 24 hours
data.description: The e-commerce platforms have agreed to comply with the Thai FDA to remove all unregistered food products and take swift action against violators within 24 hours

data.title: Shopee, Lazada agree to remove illegal food products in 24 hours
data.description: The e-commerce platforms have agreed to comply with the Thai FDA to remove all unregistered food products and take swift action against violators within 24 hours

data.title: Police break up late-night brawl between Uzbekistani women in Pattaya
data.description: Pattaya broke up a violent turf war among freelance sex workers and later freed them without charges after both sides agreed to forgive each other

data.title: Paetongtarn bans ISOC officials from receiving gifts
data.description: PM says the force lays emphasis on preventing corruption

data.title: Thai feng shui guru falls from grace as 25 victims complain of fraud
data.description: Police are investigating the so-called feng shui master after victims claim he deceived them out of 80 million baht after recommending expensive ‘sacred’ items and rituals

data.title: Thailand’s relations with US to remain strong no matter who wins election
data.description: Maris points to long history of close bilateral ties

data.title: Doi Tung Development Project ‘a role model for the world’
data.description: Thailand highlighted the success of the Doi Tung Development Project in promoting biodiversity during the United Nations Biodiversity Conference of Parties in Colombia from October 21 to November 1.

data.title: Paentongtarn leaves on a three-nation tour for multilateral meetings
data.description: Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra is embarking on a three-nation trip to China, the United States and Peru in the coming weeks, government spokesperson Jirayu Huangsap said on Tuesday.

data.title: UBB Advanced paves the way to All Intelligence
data.description: At the 10th Ultra-Broadband Forum (UBBF 2024) held from October 31 to November 1 in Istanbul, Turkey, Huawei's Executive Director and ICT Infrastructure Managing Board Chairman, David Wang, presented a keynote titled "UBB Advanced Paves the Way to All Intelligence."

data.title: Energy Security Trumps Low Prices in Thailand's Power Strategy
data.description: Thailand's energy policy must prioritise security and cleaner sources rather than focus solely on low prices to cut living and business costs, the Energy Ministry’s permanent secretary said on Wednesday.

data.title: New push in Thailand for ban on smoking in private vehicles
data.description: The Tobacco Products Control Committee is pushing to ban smoking in private cars to reduce passengers’, especially children’s, exposure to harmful smoke lingering in small spaces

data.title: Thailand greets 29 million tourists this year, earns 1.35tn baht
data.description: Tourism industry rebounds with visitors from China, Malaysia, India, South Korea and Russia leading the list; recent spike attributed to winter holidays and Diwali break

data.title: Bangkok police bust poker game, arrest 16 foreigners
data.description: 14 Chinese and 2 Taiwanese caught playing cards for money in a former restaurant after dissatisfied Thais file complaint

data.title: Separate tax for cigarettes in pipeline to combat smuggling surge
data.description: Finance Ministry aiming to plug 2.3-billion-baht gap in lost revenue

data.title: Early election takeaways: Trump weakens Democrats’ coalition
data.description: Even with the outcome uncertain Tuesday night, the 2024 presidential election already has exposed the depths of a fractured nation as the candidates navigated political shifts based on class, race and age under the near-constant threat of misinformation and violence.

data.title: Touring photographic exhibition shows HM the King at work
data.description: The Contemporary Photography Foundation of Thailand takes 109 images of the monarch from Bangkok to Nakhon Ratchasima and Hua Hin

data.title: Diesel and fresh fruit push October inflation up by 0.83%
data.description: Poonpong Naiyanapakorn, the Director General of the Trade Policy and Strategy Office, revealed that the Consumer Price Index (CPI) in October 2024 was 108.61. Compared to October 2023 (107.72), the headline inflation increased by 0.83% (YoY).

data.title: Thailand, Germany launch TGC EMC project to drive toward Net Zero goals
data.description: Eight agencies have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) under the Thai-German Cooperation on Energy, Mobility and Climate (TGC EMC) to formally demonstrate their commitment to collaboration on supporting Thailand’s climate goals.

data.title: Macbook crowned Thailand’s top brand in 2024 Superfans Survey
data.description: Iconic laptop beats competition from Dettol shower gel and HP computers

data.title: Thailand’s Festival of Lights
data.description: A part of Thai culture for centuries, Loy Krathong will be celebrated on Nov 15 and is based on the lunar calendar ritual of releasing illuminated lotus-shaped floats or krathongs on rivers and waterways. It also pays homage to the water goddess, apart from being a time to reflect, express gratitude and make a wish for good fortune. Guru By Bangkok Post  lists a few places to join in the celebrations.

data.title: ‘Harmony World Puppet Innovation Festival’ gets underway next week
data.description: Puppeteers from Australia, Turkey, Mexico, Indonesia, Laos and Myanmar will join troupes from Thailand in highlighting wildlife extinction

data.title: New master’s programmes to take tech education to a new level
data.description: Kasikorn Business-Technology Group partners with three leading universities to prepare the workforce of the future

data.title: Thai businesses urged to prepare for new round of US-China trade war
data.description: With both Harris and Trump promising to raise tariffs, Thai businesses must prepare for fallout as US-China trade war intensifies
